resources.string:
This screen will have 3 clickable TextViews for Recent Playlists, All playlists and All Songs.

 On clicking these activities, it will start corresponding activity and show a new screen. Recent Playlists activity will show list of all playlists played in the last 1 week. All playlists activity will show list of all the user playlists. All songs activity will show list of all songs.

 This screen will also have a button to create a new playlist.On clicking this button, the user will be able to create new playlist from the existing songs from songs library.

This screen will have an image that shows the poster of the album or movie the song is from.

 Below the image, it will show couple of words representing the song. Below that it will show the singer name.

 Below that, it will have time bar that will show the progress as the song is played.

 Below that it will have buttons to play or pause, forward to next song and go back to previous song.
